#include<cstdio>
#include<cmath>
int main()
{
	int t,i;
	long long int n;
	scanf("%d",&t);
	for(i=0;i<t;i++)
	{
		scanf("%lld",&n);
		double a,b;
		a = sqrt(5*n*n + 4);
		b = sqrt(5*n*n - 4);
		if(a - (long long int)a==0 || b-(long long int)b==0)
		{
			printf("Yes\n");
		}
		else
		{
			printf("No\n");
		}
	}
	return 0;
}
